userService

Interface IUserService


  • public interface IUserService
    Interface to a User Service. It implements a service where users can have friends, upload photos, and like photos of their friends.
    Author:
    Elisabet Arratia

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFriend(java.lang.String friend, java.lang.String toUser)
      Adds user friend as a friend to user toUser
      void addLike(java.lang.String fromUser, java.lang.String toUser, int inPhoto)
      Adds a "like" to a photo.
      void addUser(java.lang.String userId, java.lang.String userName)
      Creates a new user
      int getNumberOfUsers()
      Returns the number of users in the DB

      Adds user friend as a friend to user toUser

      Removes a "like" from a photo.

    • Method Detail

      • addUser

        void addUser(java.lang.String userId,
             java.lang.String userName)
        Creates a new user
        Parameters:
        userId - a String with the ID of teh user to be created.
        userName - a String with the user's Name.

      • removeUser

        void removeUser(java.lang.String userId)
        Removes new user
        Parameters:
        userId - a String with the ID of the user to be removed. If userId doesn't exist, it doesn't do anything.

      • addLike

        void addLike(java.lang.String fromUser,
             java.lang.String toUser,
             int inPhoto)
        Adds a "like" to a photo. If the users fromUser and toUser are not friends, the method doesn't do anything
        Parameters:
        fromUser - a String with the ID of the user that likes a photo.
        toUser - a String with the ID of the user to whom the photo belongs.
        inPhoto - the ID of the photo that user fromUser liked from user toUser.

      • removeLike

        void removeLike(java.lang.String fromUser,
                java.lang.String toUser,
                int inPhoto)
        Removes a "like" from a photo.
        Parameters:
        fromUser - a String with the ID of the user that used to like a photo.
        toUser - a String with the ID of the user to whom the photo belongs.
        inPhoto - the ID of the photo that user fromUser stopped liking from user toUser.

      • uploadPhoto

        void uploadPhoto(java.lang.String userId,
                 java.lang.String photoURL,
                 java.lang.String photoDescription)
        Uploads a photo
        Parameters:
        userId - a String with the ID of the user who uploaded a photo.
        photoURL - a String with the URL of the photo to be uploaded
        photoDescription - a String with the description

      • addFriend

        void addFriend(java.lang.String friend,
               java.lang.String toUser)
        Adds user friend as a friend to user toUser
        Parameters:
        friend - a String with the ID of the user to be added as a friend of toUser.
        toUser - a String with the ID of the user to whom friend is added as a friend.

      • removeFriend

        void removeFriend(java.lang.String friend,
                  java.lang.String toUser)
        Adds user friend as a friend to user toUser
        Parameters:
        friend - a String with the ID of the user to be added as a friend of toUser.
        toUser - a String with the ID of the user from whom friend is to be removed as a friend.

      • getNumberOfUsers

        int getNumberOfUsers()
        Returns the number of users in the DB
        Returns:
        the number of users in the DB
